text: Novichikhinsky District () is an administrativeLaw #28-ZS and municipalLaw #94-ZS district (raion), one of the fifty-nine in Altai Krai, Russia. It is located in the center of the krai. The area of the district is .Official website of Novichikhinsky District Its administrative center is the rural locality (a selo) of Novichikha. Population: The population of Novichikha accounts for 43.1% of the district's total population. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * Category:Districts of Altai Krai
title: Novichikhinsky District
